About

Flask-SQLAlchemy provides a SQLAlchemy extension to Flask. Flask is a micro web development framework for Python. You are currently looking at the documentation of the development version. Things are not stable yet, but if you have some feedback, let me know.

Other Formats

You can download the documentation in other formats as well:

  • as PDF
